item.description:
Every so often we post events that may interest our group. Click on links below to learn more.

Alessandra Belloni and I giullari di Piazza proudly announce the celebration of thei 30th anniversary !! presented by The World Music Institute :

Friday October 30 - 8:00pm

Tarantelle e Canti dÂ´Amore: Alessandra Belloni, John La Barbera & I Giullari di Piazza tickets $25 - Peter Norton at Symphony Space Broadway and 95th Street - NYC. call (212) 545-7536. Contact Helen or Robert Browning helene@worldmusicinstitute.org or helenewmi@aol.com / robert@worldmusicinstitute.org

A fiery "journey" through the South of Italy featuring magic rituals and tarantellas used as music therapy and exorcism, healing chants in honor of the Black Madonna, lullabies, and love ballads, as well as original songs by Alessandra Belloni and John La Barbera inspired by the rituals and rhythms of Brazil. This 30th anniversary celebration of I Giullari di Piazza features co-founders Belloni (vocals, percussion, ritual dance) and La Barbera (chitarra battente-Renaissance folk guitar, mandolin) along with Steve Gorn (clarinet, saxophone, bansuri flute), Joe Deninzon (violin, vocal), Alessandra Tartivita (soprano), Vinnie Scialla (percussion); choreographer/dancer Antonio Fini; dancers Francesca Silvano, Caterina Rago, Greta Campo, and Mark Mindek (stilts); and special guests Fran Sperling (acrobatic dancer) and Gordon Gottlieb (percussion).

www.youtube.com/alessandrabelloni

www.worldmusicinstitute.org

http://www.alessandra...

Contact Helen or Robert Browning helene@worldmusicinstitute.org or helenewmi@aol.com / robert@worldmusicinstitute.org
item.name: 30th Anniversary Celebration of i Giullari di Piazza - NYC
